comment: Professor Garner was awesome!!!!! His class was easy but informational and very helpful. He's easily one of the nicest professors I've ever had. TAKE THIS CLASS.
Go to class, put in minimal effort and you'll do great! He's a wonderful professor

LOVE LOVE LOVE his class! After being in his class I feel so much better about public speaking. He makes the class super fun and interesting. Lectures are never too long, speeches are graded fairly and outside work is minimum. He genuinely cares about each of his students and their success in the class. Would definitely recommend him to anyone.
